Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2009 05:02AM frosty2 wrote: I recently found out I was also positive for brca1.  I am 38 so my decisions may be different from yours.  I would highly recommend a genetic councelor who can talk to you about the different options and choices .   Also visit http://www.facingourrisk.org/  as they have a wonderful young "previvors" area about the BRCA gene mutation. Good luck!
Posts.Title: I have the Gene-Is Surgery the Answer? dandee354 Bronwen
